content:
Quick reminders, if you have a chance to prepare content / updates before our Wednesday call:

  • @Isaac Vetter you've volunteered to write a PR separating "Core" from "Extra" capabilities in SMART
  • @Gunther Meyer you've volunteered to write a PR introducing asymmetric credentials into SMART as a client authentication option (following the approach from Backend Services)
My regrets for this week - Cerner's internal dev conference is wed/thurs :)
my regrets this week due to conflict with IHE meeting
@Isaac Vetter @Gunther Meyer and others, can you thumbs-up here if you're available to join tomorrow's call? We might consider deferring if we don't have quorum.
(but also happy to defer -- because I haven't completed my follow-ups, yet!)
I'll admit I'm predisposed to skipping the call, since I'm under the weather. Let's cancel tomorrow's Granular Data call and pick up in our next regularly scheduled slot.
